body.p: To upload a file to your iPhone / iPod / iPad, click "Browse" or "Chooose File," select the file to upload, then click "Upload."
To upload multiple files at once, pack them up in a .zip archive, upload that single file, then tap on the uploaded file in Pleco's File Manager screen to extract its contents to a folder.
To download a previously-uploaded file from your iPhone / iPod / iPad, click on one of the links below.
